definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: First, the starting point of marketing is wet.
sentences.chinese: 第一，營銷的始點是溼的。

sentences.english: Uncover the starting and ending points and start filling in the blanks one at a time.
sentences.chinese: 找到起始點，然後開始填補空白。

sentences.english: Perhaps because self-organised criticality is the perfect starting point for many of the brain's functions.
sentences.chinese: 可能因爲自我組織臨界是許多腦功能的完美始點。

sentences.english: There is a hypermethylation sequential basis in the upstream region from the transcriptional start site of IRX1 gene.
sentences.chinese: IRX1基因轉錄起始點上游存在高甲基化結構基礎。

sentences.english: “For us the starting point is always the science,” Dr. McGill said.
sentences.chinese: “對我們來說，科學就是起始點，”麥克吉爾博士說。

sentences.english: You can use the template file as starting point.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用模板文件作爲起始點。

sentences.english: The starting point of a development project is the requirements analysis phase.
sentences.chinese: 開發項目的起始點是需求分析階段。

sentences.english: Girtim, British artist, created watercolour with a modern meaning.
sentences.chinese: 具有現代意義的水彩畫，始點當首推英國畫家格爾丁。

sentences.english: Chaos is the starting point of matters in Universe.
sentences.chinese: 混沌在我們這個宇審中是物質進行的始點。

sentences.english: The water level "resets" to its starting point when the bucket tips and empties itself.
sentences.chinese: 當吊桶傾倒光的時候水位線“復位”至其起始點。

sentences.english: The user must keep the original points if they are needed.
sentences.chinese: 使用者必須保留原始點，如果有需要的話。

sentences.english: The starting point of the ray in world coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 在世界座標，射線的起始點。

sentences.english: Defines the starting point offset and number of segments.
sentences.chinese: 定義起始點偏移量和段數。

sentences.english: Specify the aiming point for the reflector start point.
sentences.chinese: 爲反射器始點指定瞄準點。

sentences.english: This special report will point to where it is beginning to surface.
sentences.chinese: 這一特殊報告將指出其浮出水面的起始點。

sentences.english: Alternately, you can commission a spiritualist at your home point to revive you for a minor experience point penalty.
sentences.chinese: 可以委託起始點的縛靈者復活，帶有少量經驗懲罰。
